description: Stylesheet for the Tic Tac Toe frontend application defining themes, layout, and responsive design.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the application that centers its content and applies the primary background color.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the app that displays content, adjusts layout, and sets the background color.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Logo of the application with animation for visual effect.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes with hover effects.
